name: ChromaBall
description:
ChromaBall is a puzzle platformer with distinct platform types.

Move - WASD
Jump - Space

Soft Platform - Acts as a door and opens when buttons are activated

Button - Opens soft platforms when activated

Bounce platform - Cannot be stood on but can be jumped on

Ice ball - Sticks and carries the player on collision. Jump to detach

This game was made in 1.5 weeks as a challenge to myself. There are some clear rough spots but any and all criticism is welcome.

ROYALTY FREE CREDITS
Jump SFX: https://freesound.org/people/jeckkech/sounds/391670/
Music: https://pixabay.com/music/electronic-thumpy-90-final-1545/
